data.text: Hello @robalmeida We're sorry about the problems in FRA. May we ask how we can assist you?
@cruiseshipcrew @Condor @LASairport Nice shot!  Thanks!
Hello @TheEuroConnect Pls contact our 24/7 service hotline for issues requiring immediate response: 866-960-7915

@AmundsonTommy @Condor @mspairport Wow! Nice shot! Thanks!
@SunCountryAir Thanks for the #WarmWelcome! We look forward to many happy moments at T2 with you this season and the years to come!
Connect with our new interline partner @SunCountryAir from DFW, MDW or LAS via @mspairport to Frankfurt and beyond! http://t.co/goQAcVP1PN

Aaaaaaaand here it is @MSP airport #FirstFlightFromMinneapolisStPaul #Condor http://t.co/J98ykdthkB

Party …

Thank you @simpliflying! We're glad you enjoyed our new #Condor Business Class product!

Happy Father's Day to all the daddies and Papas out there!

#Condor #Contribute Update: The children’s village in Guarabira, Brazil is crazy about #soccer http://t.co/8Isf4YXIGa
Flights for less? Done! #Condor flights to Germany and beyond on #SALE http://t.co/LB8yEVmZMc http://t.co/pARMr5QJ4C
@alexskunz thanks! We're glad you enjoyed your time on board!
RT @GDClearedToLand: @Condor #767 arrives to #YHZ #Halifax @HfxStanfield @AirlineGeeks #avgeeks http://t.co/b9omSYAlHW
Ever wonder how the #SunnyHeart makes it onto our aircraft? Check out this time laps! http://t.co/cZBM6z7Y6N #AvGeek #AvGeeks
@Spinthemap that's great! We're excited to welcome you aboard next month!
@EDDFSpotting @JakeSavage99 thx! It'll also look great on our 767s ;) the first will get the new livery late summer/early fall 2014.
@EDDFSpotting correct. We have a 757 also on that route.
@EDDFSpotting UI and UD
@EDDFSpotting all flying 767 out there have the all-new cabin. The only two without are currently being refurbished.
@EDDFSpotting thanks! We're glad you like it!
Watch the christening of our #Condor #Retro Airbus http://t.co/eCdnOl28AL #throwbackthursday #AvGeek #AvGeeks
@jallonby100! There are 2 767s that have not been refurbished yet. Check http://t.co/zn5jLhe6lw to see if your flight has the new cabin.
@jallonby100! How exciting! We cannot wait to welcome you on board soon!
@lebribri these are beautiful shots! Thanks!
@lebribri We'd love to see them. Are they on Flickr?
Hi @lebribri we have 767's on the long-haul with winglets. Great shot though! We'd love to see one like this with Condor on them one day ;)
RT @airfarewatchdog: ! @Condor special fares are easy to find and book to/from FRA worldwide http://t.co/Wk6dEhoBqf
@terrysimpson @alaskatravelgrm Condor flies nonstop from Frankfurt to Las Vegas... It's not PHX but it could be an option?
@terrysimpson So are we! Excited to welcome you on board soon!
She said yes! Wedding aboard @ThomasCookBE #FlightYes14 at 30.000 feet. Congratulations Alexander and Marieke! http://t.co/xeCld12GR3
@alaskatravelgrm welcome home, Scott!
More #Legroooooooooooooom in #Condor Premium Economy Class! Flights with extra space on sale: http://t.co/jWULNhLJEE http://t.co/peo1KPJUt3
